plugin.name: One Key Reload + Unviersally Animated Ammo Check
plugin.description:
## Module 1. One Key Reload + Unviersally Animated Ammo Check ### One Key Reload: consolidates a few functions onto the reload key (default R) - Single-tap R = reload; hold R = ammo check; double-tap R = change ammo type; Shift + R = unjam/inspect - Note: you can either use the engine keybind "Reload", or the MCM keybind from this mod.
### Unviersally Animated Ammo Check - For weapons without ammo-check animations, play the reload animation instead. For weapons without magazines, play a lower/raise animation.
Disable the following addons: - G.A.M.M.A. Unjam Reload
Required addons need to be loaded first: - 207- Mags Redux (Disable G.A.M.M.A. Unjam Reload) - RavenAscendant - 261- Ammo Check - Ishmaeel

plugin.name: One Key Firemode
plugin.description: ## Module 2. One Key Firemode: keybinds consolidated to X by default. - Tap X = select next fire mode; Shift + X = select previous fire mode; hold X = check fire mode - Note: In game settings -> controls, "Previous Firing Mode" and "Next Firing Mode" need to be bound to something else (e.g. 0 and 9).

plugin.name: (Optional) Loot Loaded Magazines
plugin.description: Looted magazines has a chance to contain ammo (up to 60% full, dependent on enemy tier)

plugin.name: (Optional) Default Magazine Fixes
plugin.description: Changes the default magazine that comes with some weapons to match match the visual model (mostly for older AK variants). Note that there's still a small chance they'll spawn with fancier (upgraded) magazines. Also added magazine support for the ADAR2-15.
